Title: 22 Steps
Writer: David Shore (developed by), Jae-Beom Park (based on the Korean Broadcasting System television series by), Johanna Lee, Johanna Lee (executive story editor), David Renaud (story editor), Karen Struck (story editor), Lloyd Gilyard Jr. (staff writer)
Actors: Freddie Highmore, Nicholas Gonzalez, Antonia Thomas, Chuku Modu
Plot: Shaun has to confront prejudice from an unlikely source when he takes on the case of a patient with autism, and Dr. Kalu has to learn to accept his limitations as a surgeon.
